original_text: and each of the builders wore his sword at his side as he worked. But the man who sounded the trumpet stayed with me.
korean_text: 건축하는 자는 각각 허리에 칼을 차고 건축하며 나팔 부는 자는 내 곁에 섰었느니라

sentences.original_text: and each of the builders wore his sword at his side
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 건축자 각자는 자신의 검을 허리에 차고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: But the man who sounded the trumpet
